title: Dare To Live
description: Eli TraversRecluse. Artist. Angry.My Nasty Little MonsterI became his obsession. His love became my prison.Arabella GrayBrave. Good Girl. BrokenOur love was twisted with hate.Doomed from the start, destined to fail.We thought we'd defeated the monsters of Churchill Bradley Academy. Turns out they were hiding in the shadows, thirsting for blood.What will happen when the past refuses to stay buried and the monsters come back out to play?Dare to Live is the stunning conclusion to the Churchill Bradley Academy series.
author: L. Ann
